### **Recommended Architecture**

Your current three-collection approach is **optimal** for ESPHome documentation:

1. **`devices/`** - Physical hardware (ESP32 boards, BME280 sensors, OLED displays)
2. **`components/`** - ESPHome software components (gpio, i2c, light, binary_sensor)

This structure elegantly handles the many-to-many relationships inherent in ESPHome projects.
